name: Asteroids (itch) (Fireaid)
description:
this game is not yet finished and the art is not made by me at all so yeah expect the image! i'm also going to release a prototype soon of my first commercial game that  a friend is helping me with so stay tuned for that.(this game is not the best but it is improving my programming skills so please don't expect it to be that great,my other game that i mentioned will be better and will look and run better it will hopefully sell.

pls tell me if you encounter any bugs :)

thx

controls:

space : shoot

arrow keys to move

r to restart

to exit you hit the windows key or what every you have that shows its tab and quit it there (will make a exit button)
